🔧 Console Fix for Car Inventory (0)

🎯 Quick Fix Method
Since the Car Inventory is still showing (0), let's use a direct browser console approach to bypass any permission issues.
📋 Instructions:
1. Go to Car Inventory page: http://localhost:5173/car-inventory
2. Open browser console (F12 → Console tab)
3. Copy and paste the script below
4. Press Enter to run it
🛠️ Console Script:
Copy this entire script and paste it in the browser console:
// Car Inventory Quick Fix - Run this in browser console on Car Inventory page (async function quickInventoryFix() { console.log('🚗 Starting Car Inventory Quick Fix...'); try { // First, let's check what Supabase client is available let supabaseClient = null; // Try different ways to access Supabase if (window.supabase) { supabaseClient = window.supabase; console.log('✅ Found window.supabase'); } else { // Create our own Supabase client const { createClient } = await import('https://cdn.skypack.dev/@supabase/supabase-js'); supabaseClient = createClient( 'https://wunqntfreyezylvbzvxc.supabase.co', 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Ind1bnFudGZyZXllenlsdmJ6dnhjIiwicm9sZSI6ImFub24iLCJpYXQiOjE3NDc3NDE4MDIsImV4cCI6MjA2MzMxNzgwMn0.AphXufXZef_wAvVT3TXl2s_JQwbI9wK6KN2uCQgVc5o' ); console.log('✅ Created new Supabase client'); } // Check tables console.log('🔍 Checking tables...'); const { data: carsData, error: carsError } = await supabaseClient .from('cars') .select('*') .limit(5); const { data: inventoryData, error: inventoryError } = await supabaseClient .from('car_inventory') .select('*') .limit(5); console.log('📊 Cars table:', carsData?.length || 0, 'records'); console.log('📦 Car_inventory table:', inventoryData?.length || 0, 'records'); if (carsError) console.log('❌ Cars error:', carsError.message); if (inventoryError) console.log('❌ Inventory error:', inventoryError.message); // If we have data in car_inventory but not in cars, copy it if (inventoryData && inventoryData.length > 0 && (!carsData || carsData.length === 0)) { console.log('🔄 Copying data from car_inventory to cars...'); // Get all data const { data: allInventory } = await supabaseClient .from('car_inventory') .select('*'); if (allInventory && allInventory.length > 0) { console.log(`📊 Found ${allInventory.length} vehicles to copy`); // Transform data const transformedData = allInventory.map(item => ({ vin_number: item.vin, brand: 'Voyah', model: item.model, year: item.model_year, color: item.color, category: item.vehicle_type === 'EV' ? 'EV' : 'REV', status: item.status === 'Available' ? 'in_stock' : item.status === 'Sold' ? 'sold' : 'reserved', current_location: 'Inventory', selling_price: item.selling_price || 50000, battery_percentage: 100, range_km: 520, notes: item.client_name ? `Client: ${item.client_name}` : null })); // Insert in smaller batches to avoid timeouts const batchSize = 10; let successCount = 0; for (let i = 0; i < transformedData.length; i += batchSize) { const batch = transformedData.slice(i, i + batchSize); try { const { error } = await supabaseClient .from('cars') .insert(batch); if (error) { console.log(`❌ Batch ${i/batchSize + 1} error:`, error.message); } else { successCount += batch.length; console.log(`✅ Batch ${i/batchSize + 1}: ${batch.length} vehicles`); } } catch (e) { console.log(`❌ Batch ${i/batchSize + 1} failed:`, e.message); } } console.log(`🎉 Copied ${successCount} vehicles to cars table!`); console.log('🔄 Refreshing page in 3 seconds...'); setTimeout(() => { window.location.reload(); }, 3000); } else { console.log('❌ No data found in car_inventory table'); } } else if (carsData && carsData.length > 0) { console.log('✅ Cars table has data, trying to refresh components...'); // Try to trigger a component refresh const event = new CustomEvent('inventoryRefresh'); window.dispatchEvent(event); // Also try reloading the page setTimeout(() => { console.log('🔄 Refreshing page...'); window.location.reload(); }, 2000); } else { console.log('❌ No data found in either table'); console.log('💡 You may need to upload your stock data first'); } } catch (error) { console.error('❌ Fix failed:', error); console.log('💡 Try refreshing the page and running the script again'); } })();
🚀 After Running the Script:
• The page should automatically refresh
• Car Inventory should show your vehicle count
• If it still shows (0), try manually refreshing the page
